question_text: Which two of the following are true about SANs? (Select two)
answer_options: They provide centralized access to block-level storage
They use Bluetooth to connect storage devices
They are often used in data centers
They replace the need for LANs in enterprise networks
correct_answer: They provide centralized access to block-level storage
They are often used in data centers
explanation: SANs enable servers to access shared block-level storage and are common in environments like data centers for performance and reliability.
